thread.title: EU threatens countermeasures to Trump's steel tariffs

title: EU threatens countermeasures to Trump's steel tariffs
text:
EU threatens countermeasures to Trump's steel tariffs 6:30pm GMT - 01:39 
EU finance ministers have said they hope to avoid a trade war with the U.S. But, as Ivor Bennett reports, the European Commission has vowed to prepare retaliatory measures if necessary. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
EU finance ministers have said they hope to avoid a trade war with the U.S. But, as Ivor Bennett reports, the European Commission has vowed to prepare retaliatory measures if necessary.
